entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hardy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:48 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 01:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 6.7°C
Wind: W 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
